mapper.insert: insert into gpreply(gpostnum, userid, gprcontents) value (#{gpostnum}, #{userid}, #{gprcontents})
mapper.select: select count(*) from gpreply where gpostnum=#{gpostnum}
select count(*) from gpreply where gpostnum=#{gpostnum} and timestampdiff(HOUR,gprregdate,now())<1
select * from gpreply where gpostnum=#{gpostnum} order by gprnum desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
